title: Service disruption on the East West Line

title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di Laluan Timur Barat

updates.text: 9.00am: EWL - Fault cleared. Train service resumed. Free regular bus service is still available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

8.45am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 10 minutes of travelling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

7.00am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 10 minutes of travelling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

7.00am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 10 minutes of travelling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.

7.00am: EWL - Due to a track point fault, please add additional 10 minutes  of travelling time between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations. Free regular bus service is available between Tampines and Pasir Ris stations.
